title: Apricot couronne
description: Make teatime special with this sweet, glazed crown of rich bread stuffed with apricots, walnuts and raisins.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strong white bread flour, plus extra for dusting
50g/1¾oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
120g/4½oz ready-to-eat dried apricots, chopped and soaked in orange juice
